entry.title: Wednesday night: Partly cloudy. Low minus 13.
entry.summary: Increasing cloudiness this evening. Fog patches developing overnight. Wind southwest 20 km/h becoming light this evening. Low minus 13. Wind chill minus 9 this evening and minus 19 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Wednesday 29 March 2023

entry.title: Thursday: Chance of light snow. High minus 2. POP 30%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 30 percent chance of light snow. Fog patches dissipating in the morning. Wind becoming northeast 20 km/h near noon. High minus 2. Wind chill minus 16 in the morning and minus 8 in the afternoon. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Wednesday 29 March 2023
